properties.Name: MasterRecipe
properties.Description:
A master recipe is targeted to a processing area and is derived from either a general or site recipe. 

Master recipes depend on equipment types or classes

These recipes can contain product-specific information required for detailed scheduling, such as equipment requirements. 

A master recipe is the template for recipes used to create individual batches. Without this template, no specific batch recipes can be created, and therefore, no batches can be produced.

Columns.Name: RecipeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe.

Properties.Description:
A master recipe is targeted to a processing area and is derived from either a general or site recipe. 

Master recipes depend on equipment types or classes

These recipes can contain product-specific information required for detailed scheduling, such as equipment requirements. 

A master recipe is the template for recipes used to create individual batches. Without this template, no specific batch recipes can be created, and therefore, no batches can be produced.
